chapter.text: 54|1|simpan-ui nal-i gakkawo omae dal i dullo bunlidoedeola
54|2|geudeul-i geu yejeung-eul boassda ha deolado igeos-eun hangsang issneun masul-e bulgwahadago geudeul-eun malhanola
54|3|geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan chae geudeul ui yogmang-eul ttaleul ppun-ila geuleona modeun-il-eun jijeongdoen sigag-e ileunola
54|4|imi geudeul-eul gyeong-gohan iyagideul i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eumyeo
54|5|wanseongdoen jihyedo iss-eoss-euna gyeong-go janeun geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshaessdeola
54|6|geudeul-eul meollihala cheonsaga geu deul-eul geudeul-i silh-eohaneun gos-eulo ho chulhalila
54|7|geudeul-eun cholahan nundongjalo mudeom-eseo naoni mettugiga heut-eojyeo na oneun geosgwa gatdeola
54|8|geudeul-eun cheonsa-egelo dallyeoga oneul-eun neomu eolyeoun nal-ibnida lago malhalila
54|9|noaui baegseong-i seonjijideul-eul geoyeoghaessdeus-i geudeuldo hananim-ui seonjijaleul geoyeoghamyeo yeogie han michinjaga iss-euni geuga chubangdoeeoya handago malhayeossnola
54|10|geuttae geuga junimkke gidohadeola jega heoyaghaoni jeoleul dowa jusoseo
54|11|geulihayeo hananim-eun haneul-ui mundeul-eul yeolgo bileul naelige hayeo
54|12|daejiui umul sog-eulo heuleugehani geu mul-eun imi jeonghaejindaelo mannadeola
54|13|hananim-eun geuleul neolpanjiwa mos-eulo mandeul-eojin bangjue taeuni
54|14|geugeos-eun hananim-i jikyeoboneun gaunde tteo iss-eossdeola geugeos-eun bulsin danghan noa-e daehan bosang-ila
54|15|hananim-i igeos-eul yejeung-eulo namgyeoss-eudoe geugeos-eul gyohun-eulo bad-adeul il ja issgessneunyo
54|16|naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goga eolmana museowossdeonyo
54|17|kkulan-eul ihaehago amgihagieswibdolog hayeoss-eudoe ileul gyohun-eulo bad-adeul-ilyeo haneun ja issneunyo
54|18|adeu baegseong-i jinlileul geoyeoghaess eul ttae naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goga eolmana museowossdeonyo
54|19|gyeoglyeolhan jaeang-ui nal geudeul wiemojin balam-eul bonaemae
54|20|jonglyeonamuui ppulideul-i ppomhin geoscheoleom salamdeul-eul jab-a chaeeossdeola
54|21|naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goga eolmana museowossdeonyo
54|22|kkulan-eul ihaehago amgihagi swibdolog hayeoss-eudoe ileul gyohun-eulo bad-adeul-ilyeo haneun ja issneunyo
54|23|samudeu baegseongdo geudeul-ui gyeong-go jadeul-eul geoyeoghaessdeola
54|24|uliwa ttoggat-eun han ingan-eul u liga ttalaya hal pil-yoga issneunyo geu leohge handamyeon sillo ulineun banghwangha myeo michin geos-ila
54|25|ulijung-eseo geuege gyesiga naelyeojyeossdan al-inyo anila geuneun geojishamyeo omanhan jalago hayeossdeola
54|26|naeil-imyeon nuga geojishamyeo o manhan ja ingaleul geudeul-eun alge doeli la
54|27|hananimkkeseo amkeos-ui nagtaleul bonaeni geudeul-eul siheomhagi wihaeseola geudeul-eul jikyeobomyeo ne seuseulo innae hala
54|28|geuligo mul-i geudeul saie bunbaedoeni gagjaga masil mul-ui mogs-i jeonghaejideola
54|29|geudeul-i donglyoleul buleuni geuga kal-eul deul-eo amkeos-ui nagtaleul salhaeha yeossdeola
54|30|ittae naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goga eol mana museowossdeonyo
54|31|hananim-i geudeul-ege dolpung-eul mol-achini geudeul-eun gachug salyosaga mandeun memaleun namu-ipcheoleom doeeobeoli deola
54|32|hananim-eun kkulan-eul ihaehago amgihagie swibdolog hayeossnola ileulgyohun-eulo bad-adeul-ilyeo haneun ja iss neunyo
54|33|los-ui baegseongdo gyeong-goleul geoyeoghaess euni
54|34|hananim-eun geudeul-ege dolpung-ui sonagileul bonae los-ui gajog-eul je oehagoneun myeolmangke haess-eumyeo geu gajog eun ileun saebyeognyeok-e guhaessnola
54|35|igeos-i hananim eunhyegaunde hanalo ileohge hananim-eun gamsahaneunjadeul-ege eunhyeleul bepunola
54|36|geuneun geudeul-ege hananim-ui beol eul gyeong-gohaess-euna geudeul-eun geu gyeong-go-e daehayeo nonjaeng-eul haessnola
54|37|geudeul-eun geuui sonnimmajeo geudeul ege hangbogke halyeo hayeoss-euni hana nim-eun geudeul-ui nun-eul jangnim-eulo hayeo beolimyeo ije naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goleul masbola hasideola
54|38|da-eumnal ileun achim yeong-wonhan ung beol-i geudeul-ege naelyeojyeoss-euni
54|39|naui eungbeolgwa gyeong-goleul masbola
54|40|hananim-eun kkulan-eul ihaehago amgihagie swibdolog hayeossnola ileul gyohun-eulo bad-adeul-ilyeo haneun ja issneunyo
54|41|palao baegseong-egedo gyeong-gojaga dolaehayeoss-euna
54|42|geudeul-eun hananim-ui yejeungdeul-eul geoyeoghayeoss-eumae hananim-eun tteusgwa gwonneung eulo chungmanhasin geubun-ui eungbeol-eul geu deul-ege naelyeossnola
54|43|neohui bulsinjadeul-i geudeulboda uwolhaneunyo animyeon seongseodeul sog-e neohuie-ui eungbeol-i je-oelado doeeossdan mal-inyo
54|44|seolo dowa seuseuloga seunglihal su issdago geudeul-i malhaneunyo
54|45|geudeul moduneun paebaehayeo dwidol a seoge doelila
54|46|geu sigag-eun geudeul-ege yagsogdoen sigag-eulo gajang seulpeugo gotongseuleoun sigag-i doelila
54|47|sillo joeindeul-eun banghwanghamyeo mi chinjadeul-ila
54|48|geudeul-i gogae sog-yeo buljiog-eu lo kkeullieo ganeun nal jiog-ui eungbeol-eul masbola haneun solileul deul-eulila
54|49|hananim-eun johwalo modeun geos-eul changjohayeoss-euni
54|50|hananim-ui myeonglyeong-eun hanmadiui malloseo nun kkambaghaneun geosgwa gatnila
54|51|hananim-eun neohuiwa yusahan mu lideul-eul myeolmangke haessnani ileul gyohun eulo bad-a deul-ineun ja issneunyo
54|52|geudeul-i haenghan modeun geos-eun gilog doenani
54|53|jag-eun geosdo geuligo keun geosdo modu gilogdoenola
54|54|sillo uiloun jadeul-eun gangmul-i heuleuneun cheongug-eseo gigeohage doeni
54|55|geugos-eun gwonneung-eulo chungmanhasin junimgyeot-ui yeong-gwangseuleoun gos-ila
